project_descr: OVERSEAS COUNTRIES AND TERRITORIES (OCTs) REGIONAL RISK REDUCTION INITIATIVE (R3I).

outputs.output_descr: The project seeks to address the risk of British and Dutch overseas territories by providing a network of regional infrastructure and protocols to strengthen their capacity to predict and prepare for natural hazards, improve resilience and reduce risk.

document_name: 00051479_Regional Risk Reduction Intiative Project Document final
